656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  16 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  16) function! s:get_header_lines() abort " {{{
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  17 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  17)   let Git = gita#utils#vital#Git()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  18 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  18)   let local_branch = Git.get_branch_name()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  19 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  19)   let remote_branch = Git.get_remote_branch_name()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  20 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  20)   let incoming = Git.count_incoming()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  21 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  21)   let outgoing = Git.count_outgoing()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  22 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  22) 
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  23 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  23)   let lines = ['# On branch ' . local_branch]
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  24 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  24)   if incoming > 0 && outgoing > 0
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  25 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  25)     call add(lines,
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  26 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  26)           \ printf(
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  27 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  27)           \   '# This branch is %d commit(s) ahead of and %d commit(s) behind %s',
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  28 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  28)           \   outgoing, incoming, remote_branch
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  29 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  29)           \ ))
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  30 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  30)   elseif incoming > 0
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  31 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  31)     call add(lines,
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  32 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  32)           \ printf(
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  33 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  33)           \   '# This branch is %d commit(s) behind %s',
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  34 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  34)           \   incoming, remote_branch
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  35 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  35)           \ ))
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  36 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  36)   elseif outgoing > 0
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  37 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  37)     call add(lines,
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  38 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  38)           \ printf(
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  39 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  39)           \   '# This branch is %d commit(s) ahead of %s',
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  40 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  40)           \   outgoing, remote_branch
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  41 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  41)           \ ))
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  42 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  42)   endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  43 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  43)   return lines
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  44 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  44) endfunction " }}}
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  45 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  45) function! s:action(action, ...) abort " {{{

656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  63 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  63)   let Git = gita#utils#vital#Git()

656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  74 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  74) function! s:action_clear(status, settings) " {{{
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  75 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  75)   let Git = gita#utils#vital#Git()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  76 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  76)   if a:status.is_untracked
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  77 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  77)     redraw
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  78 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  78)     echohl GitaWarning
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  79 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  79)     echo  'Remove the untracked "' . a:status.path . '":'
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  80 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  80)     echohl None
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  81 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  81)     echo  'This operation will remove the untracked file and could not be reverted.'
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  82 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  82)     echohl GitaQuestion
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  83 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  83)     let a = gita#utils#input_yesno(
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  84 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  84)           \ 'Are you sure that you want to remove the untracked file?')
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  85 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  85)     echohl None
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  86 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  86)     if a
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  87 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  87)       call delete(a:status.path)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  88 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  88)     endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  89 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  89)   else
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  90 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  90)     redraw
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  91 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  91)     echohl GitaWarning
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  92 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  92)     echo  'Discard the local changes on "' . a:status.path . '":'
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  93 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  93)     echohl None
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  94 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  94)     echo  'This operation will discard the local changes on the file and revert it to the latest commit.'
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  95 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  95)     echohl GitaQuestion
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  96 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  96)     let a = gita#utils#input_yesno(
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  97 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  97)           \ 'Are you sure that you want to discard the local changes?')
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  98 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  98)     echohl None
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim  99 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900  99)     if a
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 100 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 100)       call Git.checkout(a:status.path, ['HEAD'])
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 101 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 101)     endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 102 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 102)   endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 103 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 103)   call gita#interface#status#update()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 104 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 104) endfunction " }}}
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 105 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 105) function! s:action_open(status, settings) " {{{
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 106 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 106)   let opener = get(
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 107 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 107)         \ a:settings.openers,
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 108 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 108)         \ a:settings.action_opener,
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 109 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 109)         \ a:settings.action_opener
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 110 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 110)         \)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 111 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 111)   let bufname = get(a:status, 'path2', a:status.path)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 112 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 112)   let bufnum = bufnr(bufname)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 113 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 113)   let winnum = bufwinnr(bufnum)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 114 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 114) 
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 115 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 115)   if winnum == -1
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 116 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 116)     let previous_winnum = bufwinnr(get(a:settings, 'previous_bufnum'))
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 117 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 117)     if previous_winnum != -1
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 118 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 118)       execute previous_winnum . 'wincmd w'
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 119 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 119)     else
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 120 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 120)       execute 'wincmd p'
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 121 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 121)     endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 122 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 122)     call gita#utils#vital#Buffer().open(bufname, opener)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 123 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 123)   else
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 124 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 124)     execute winnum . 'wincmd w'
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 125 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 125)   endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 126 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 126) endfunction " }}}
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 127 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 127) function! s:action_browse(status, settings) " {{{
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 128 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 128)   echo "Not implemented yet"
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 129 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 129) endfunction " }}}
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 130 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 130)

656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 186 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 186)     execute winnum . 'wincmd w'

656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 193 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 193) function! gita#interface#status#update(...) abort " {{{
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 194 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 194)   let bufname = s:get_buffer_name('status')
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 195 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 195)   let settings = extend({
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 196 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 196)         \ 'opener': g:gita#interface#status#opener,

656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 199 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 199)         \}, get(a:000, 0, gita#utils#getbufvar(bufname, 'settings', {})))
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 200 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 200)   " this function should be called on the gita:status window
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 201 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 201)   if bufname !=# expand('%')
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 202 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 202)     call gita#utils#call_on_buffer(bufname,
0b0569a9114e4748b1368b168f2c7b8eda25d9c8 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 203 (lambdalisue 1426194280 +0900 203)           \ function('gita#interface#status#update'),
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 204 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 204)           \ settings)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 205 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 205)     return
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 206 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 206)   endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 207 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 207) 
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 208 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 208)   let Git = gita#utils#vital#Git()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 209 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 209)   let statuslist = Git.get_status()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 210 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 210)   if empty(statuslist) || empty(statuslist.all)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 211 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 211)     bw!
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 212 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 212)     return
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 213 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 213)   endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 214 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 214) 
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 215 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 215)   " put gist lines and links
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 216 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 216)   let lines = s:get_header_lines()
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 217 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 217)   let linelinks = []
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 218 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 218)   for line in lines
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 219 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 219)     call add(linelinks, {})
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 220 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 220)   endfor
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 221 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 221)   for status in statuslist.all
0b0569a9114e4748b1368b168f2c7b8eda25d9c8 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 222 (lambdalisue 1426194280 +0900 222)     call add(lines, status.record)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 223 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 223)     call add(linelinks, status)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 224 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 224)   endfor
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 225 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 225) 
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 226 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 226)   " remove entire content and rewriet the lines
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 227 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 227)   setlocal modifiable
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 228 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 228)   let save_cur = getpos(".")
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 229 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 229)   silent %delete _
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 230 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 230)   call setline(1, split(join(lines, "\n"), "\n"))
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 231 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 231)   call setpos('.', save_cur)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 232 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 232)   setlocal nomodifiable
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 233 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 233)   setlocal nomodified
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 234 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 234) 
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 235 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 235)   " store variables to the buffer
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 236 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 236)   let b:settings = settings
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 237 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 237)   let b:linelinks = linelinks
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 238 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 238) endfunction " }}}
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 239 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 239) function! gita#interface#status#define_highlights() abort " {{{
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 240 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 240)   highlight default link GitaStatusComment      Comment
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 241 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 241)   highlight default link GitaStatusConflicted   ErrorMsg
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 242 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 242)   highlight default link GitaStatusUnstaged     WarningMsg
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 243 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 243)   highlight default link GitaStatusStaged       Question
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 244 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 244)   highlight default link GitaStatusUntracked    WarningMsg
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 245 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 245)   highlight default link GitaStatusIgnored      Question
ebcc55bee6ed0237ff86e6dfe7364ab166791de1 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 246 (lambdalisue 1426194460 +0900 246)   highlight default link GitaStatusBranch       Title
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 246 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 247) endfunction " }}}
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 247 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 248) function! gita#interface#status#define_syntax() abort " {{{
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 248 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 249)   execute 'syntax match GitaStatusComment    /\v^#.*/'
0b0569a9114e4748b1368b168f2c7b8eda25d9c8 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 249 (lambdalisue 1426194280 +0900 250)   execute 'syntax match GitaStatusConflicted /\v^%(DD|AU|UD|UA|DU|AA|UU)\s.*\ze/'

656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 278 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 282)     if !exists('g:gita#interface#status#' . key)
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 279 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 283)       execute 'let g:gita#interface#status#' . key . ' = ' . value
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 280 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 284)     endif
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 281 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 285)   endfor
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 282 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 286)   let g:gita#interface#status#openers = extend(s:default_openers,
656465cef4559417a88e92f5235c4c43476fe963 autoload/gita/interface/status.vim 283 (lambdalisue 1426187381 +0900 287)         \ get(g:, 'gita#interface#status#openers', {}))
